channel.title: Nub in Distress!
channel.description: Yea, im a total server noob. But i was just wondering... ive used cavaj to decompile such things as npchandler.class... how do i change them into .java? yes, a totaly nub question, but its better to ask than to sit back and try to figure it out =]

item.title: Nub in Distress!
item.dc:creator: @parkview parkview
item.description:
@parkview wrote:

Some people make it so you can`t decompile. Just go in the download section and get a server there with .java files in it allready.

Read full topic

item.title: Nub in Distress!
item.dc:creator: @Season-Scape Season-Scape
item.description:
@Season-Scape wrote:

[quote=“b1g th13f, post:2, topic:191182”]Open the file up.
Copy everything.
Close it.
Open up a new notepad.
And paste everything in that, and saveAs it as npchandler.java
see if that works.[/quote]

rofl wow how many errors would u get :0

Read full topic

item.title: Nub in Distress!
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

[quote=“b1g th13f, post:2, topic:191182”]Open the file up.
Copy everything.
Close it.
Open up a new notepad.
And paste everything in that, and saveAs it as npchandler.java
see if that works.[/quote]
you gotta be fucking kidding me.

The java files should already be in the folder, if they aren’t, the server wasnt meant to be edited.

Read full topic

item.title: Nub in Distress!
item.dc:creator: @weihoppa2 weihoppa2
item.description:
@weihoppa2 wrote:

Rubiks Cube:

get a source with the .java’s and stop trying to leech someone who has made it that way so it cant be leeched

Im using moparisthebest.com? so err yea… not exactly leeching… -.-

item.title: Nub in Distress!
item.dc:creator: @b1g_th13f b1g th13f
item.description:
@b1g_th13f wrote:

Open the file up.
Copy everything.
Close it.
Open up a new notepad.
And paste everything in that, and saveAs it as npchandler.java
see if that works.

Read full topic
